body_html:
Hi @gut, I am currently working on it. I guess by tomorrow I will have a VSX.c file with tests etc...

The problem I guess is that not only muls and cmul changed but also adds. I am currenlty writing/modifying calls for https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THVectorDefault.c

body:
Hi @gut, I am currently working on it. I guess by tomorrow I will have a VSX.c file with tests etc... 

The problem I guess is that not only `muls` and `cmul` changed but also `adds`. I am currenlty writing/modifying calls for https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THVectorDefault.c
